title: Small tip to people with high ping (Coming from 120+ pinger)
body:
Spam right click instead of holding down right click. 

To test for yourself, play a champion that needs to stutter step. 
1. Autoattack/use spell and hold right click as you're casting. Note the delay.
2. Autoattack/use spell and spam right click as you're casting. Compare the delay.

Spamming results in a much faster and more responsive stutterstep. (This may or may not apply to low ping as well)
